short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find out which fonts are more commonly used to display the webpage you're checking.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Font Inspector is a tool that can help you optimize your web design by providing detailed insights into the usage of fonts on any webpage.

With just one click, you can see the percentage distribution of fonts across the content, which can help you make informed decisions about font optimization.

By getting a comprehensive understanding of the different font variations you are using on your webpage, you can streamline your font choices more effectively.

You can identify and potentially remove fonts that have a lower impact on the webpage visualization, which can accelerate loading times.

This leads to a more polished and efficient online experience ðŸš€
